extendedInfo.description: This free preview app shows off 5 categories and 20 different words of the full app that is available for only $0.99!The full is as a interactive and engaging app with nine different basic word categories and over ninety different words; it is a perfect way to teach your toddler to recognize and read their first set of words.  If your child doesn't know what the word is, they can click on the image to hear it spoken to them.  The app also pushes the edge with words by introducing more advanced words early so your children have a leg-up on everyone else.Simple UI, no ads, no links to any sites... this app won't take your kids anywhere you don't want them - your kids will be safe while playing this educational game.The categories featured in this preview app are:  Animals, Numbers, Colors, Food, and Shapes.If you child loves this app, you should definitely check out the full version!
